# MISC::SET_IDEAL_SPAWN_DISTANCE_FOR_INCIDENT

## Parameters
* **INCIDENT_INDEX** incident
* **FLOAT** distance

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the ideal spawn distance for the incident
